issue.title: [CF 151] Numeric Timer Countdown
issue.body:
Thank you again for the great addon (& fixing the when equipped bug! :)

Currently TMW offers two options to show the CD remaining on an icon:

1.  Blizzard's default clockwise wipe animation (Show Timer is Checked)
2.  TMW Timer bar

I find both of these a little hard to track/estimate at a glance mid-fight.  I would like to suggest a third option:

3.  A simple number countdown in seconds remaining - this would be overlaid on the particular icon in the center.

Not an issue, would be a helpful enhancement if it is easy to do.


> Posted by CurseForge user reducto | Imported from CurseForge issue #151 | Raw

comments.body:
OmniCC (http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/omni-cc/) does exactly what you are looking for (OmniCC is the addon that is required for the 'Show timer text' option to be togglable.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just wanted to thank you for this advice, the omni-cc author even has a cut-down version to do exactly this (http://wow.curse.com/downloads/wow-addons/details/tullacc.aspx) without any unnecessary baggage. It pairs up wonderfully with your addon.

Many thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user reducto
